Uses of Package
com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios

  • Packages that use com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios 
    Package Description
    com.opengamma.strata.engine
    Engine API.
    com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata
    Market data containers used by the calculation engine.
    com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios
    Types that define scenarios which allow perturbations to be applied to market data.
    com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.scenarios.curves
    Market data filters and perturbations that apply to curves and related market data types.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios used by com.opengamma.strata.engine 
    Class and Description
    ScenarioDefinition
    A scenario definition defines how to create multiple sets of market data for running calculations over a set of scenarios.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios used by com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata 
    Class and Description
    ScenarioDefinition
    A scenario definition defines how to create multiple sets of market data for running calculations over a set of scenarios.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios used by com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios 
    Class and Description
    MarketDataFilter
    Encapsulates a rule or set of rules to decide whether a Perturbation applies to a piece of market data.
    Perturbation
    Describes a perturbation applied to a single piece of data as part of a scenario.
    PerturbationMapping
    Contains one or more market data perturbations and a filter that decides what market data they apply to.
    PerturbationMapping.Builder
    The bean-builder for PerturbationMapping.
    PerturbationMapping.Meta
    The meta-bean for PerturbationMapping.
    ScenarioDefinition
    A scenario definition defines how to create multiple sets of market data for running calculations over a set of scenarios.
    ScenarioDefinition.Builder
    The bean-builder for ScenarioDefinition.
    ScenarioDefinition.Meta
    The meta-bean for ScenarioDefinition.
  • Classes in com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.scenarios used by com.opengamma.strata.function.marketdata.scenarios.curves 
    Class and Description
    MarketDataFilter
    Encapsulates a rule or set of rules to decide whether a Perturbation applies to a piece of market data.
    Perturbation
    Describes a perturbation applied to a single piece of data as part of a scenario.
